If there was a Shinsengumi movie in America, which movie company 
should make it?  I'd suggest the guys who did the Last Samurai.  
Wasn't it Warner Bros.?

I'd love to send this Shinsengumi movie suggestion to any of the 
companies by email or something...

Well, there's probably other studios, too.  Maybe the guys who 
handled Lord of the Rings?  Anyone who's good at HISTORICAL research 
should do it... although it might be kind of complicated to... 
because most of the actors, it would just make more sense if they 
were Japanese.

*shrug* Just wanna see what anyone else thought.  Maybe I'm 
daydreaming all over again.
